overview:
Ojas is a 25 years old Indian entrepreneur, coder, author, tech evangelist and active member of TIE.

Classic social misfit nerdy geek, somewhat set in his own ways, and modestly active. Always looking for fellow misfits, whom he seems to get along with best.

Backyard science enthusiast and electronics hobbyist. Hardcore techie and programmer. He mentored at Microsoft Imagine cup twice. Founded “Deskbook”, an app for Facebook which was showcased on CNET by Don Reisinger as one of the top desktop apps in 2006, BTW it pioneered the “upcoming birthday” feature in Facebook Apps.

In his teenage, He wrote over 20 apps and 4 arcade style games in his teenage which includes things like firewall and antispyware.

He has written several software system for his college and university for which he received a prize and MS T-Shirt from MS student partner team at Microsoft, which he proudly wears everywhere.
